metadata.title: CVE-2018-18650 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.00. XRef::readXRefStream in XRef.ccallows attackers to launch a denial of service (Integer Overflow) via acrafted /Size value in a pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. This ismainly caused by the program attempting a malloc operation for a largeamount of memory.

criterions.comment: ipe package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
